meaningMnemonic:
The kanji means <kanji>male</kanji> and this also means <vocabulary>male</vocabulary>. It's used for animals, plants, and the like.

Note that this is often written in katakana, as in オス.
readingMnemonic: <vocabulary>Male</vocabulary> animals can be kind of pushy, always trying <reading>to push</reading> (押す) other animals around, trying to be the alpha and all.
